query:
SELECT EXISTS(
                SELECT 1 
                FROM http_trigger 
                WHERE 
                    (workspaced_route IS TRUE AND workspace_id || '/' || route_path_key = $1) 
                    OR (workspaced_route IS FALSE AND route_path_key = $1)
                    AND http_method = $2 
                    AND ($3::TEXT IS NULL OR path != $3)
            )
